root.message: The CLASS_SYSTEM field for indicator 3-3-2, translated into all languages

languages.language: Definitions and reporting framework for tuberculosis – 2013 revision (WHO/HTM/TB/2013.2). Geneva: World Health Organization; 2013 (https://www.who.int/publications/i/item/9789241505345 ).
